resources.string: Welcome to raceplan.io! Please take a moment to swipe through the hints and tips for using this app properly.
Click create plan below, and raceplan.io will prompt you for your race information.
raceplan.io will automatically generate a training plan that caters to your needs.
Once your plan has been created, you should refresh your google calendar app and see your runs.
If you would like to delete your training plan, click list plans below and then click the white trash can.
If you have any feedback, please feel free to contact me on twitter @ryanpagedev

If you need to uninstall the app, it is highly recommended to delete all training plans first. If you do not do this, you will need to do it through Google Calendar, which could potentially take a long time.\n\n Thanks again for using raceplan.io and please send all feedback to raceplanapp@gmail.com
Please enter a name for your training plan.
Please select the race you are training for.
Please select your current experience level.
Please select the date of your race.
Choose to create plan on dedicated calendar or your own.

Thanks again for trying out raceplan.io, I hope it has provided you with an easy and effective tool for planning your training. I sure have had a great time building it. Again if you have any feedback, feel free to leave a review or send an email to runplannerapp@gmail.com.

Happy running!
- Ryan
